name: Ex rel. BEVERLY BRYANT FOREIGN ESTATE Inter Vivos Non Resident Alien Foreign Neutral in Propria Persona Sui Juris in Vivus, Petitioner v. BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Beverly Bryant Foreign Estate v. Bank of New York Mellon

parties: Ex rel. BEVERLY BRYANT FOREIGN ESTATE Inter Vivos Non Resident Alien Foreign Neutral in Propria Persona Sui Juris in Vivus, Petitioner v. BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 1st day of September, 2016, the “Original Matters Jurisdiction Petition” is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
145 A.3d 1136
Ex rel. BEVERLY BRYANT FOREIGN ESTATE Inter Vivos Non Resident Alien Foreign Neutral in Propria Persona Sui Juris in Vivus, Petitioner v. BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, Respondent.
No. 138 EM 2016.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 1, 2016.
